summary: Tweaks the english translation to read "Septim(s)" in the user interface
descriptionHtml:
[i]A simple add-on to mods that change the name of Gold in-game to "Septim"[/i]

[size=6]Compatibility
[/size][i]Should be compatible with everything that does not edit or replace the following file([size=3]s):

[b]Translate_ENGLISH.txt

[/b][/size][/i][size=6]Multi-Language Support
[i][size=3]I have plans to provide multi-language support for the future. For now, only English is supported.


[/size][/i][size=3][size=6]Credits
[size=3][i]All files modified and uploaded can be found in Skyrim's BSA files. If I recall, Skyrim install a translation file as a loose file depending on your OS or Steam's main language.[/i][/size][/size][/size][/size]
author: SynthetiXxX
